issue.title: Forward / Reverse switch visual temporarily disappeared

content.raw:
Changing the appearance of the Forward / Reverse switch is done in [DRCVehiclePlugin::UpdateFNRSwitchTime()](#!/osrf/drcsim/src/7ff63e8aab47973b10539420d5a8685aa2bb9384/plugins/DRCVehiclePlugin.cc?at=default#cl-350) by sending a pair of gazebo topic messages to the gazebo topic `~/visual`. It's possible that dropped messages could cause this problem.

It's unfortunately too late to fix this. I'll do some stress testing on my machine to see how frequently it occurs.
content.html:
Changing the appearance of the Forward / Reverse switch is done in DRCVehiclePlugin::UpdateFNRSwitchTime() by sending a pair of gazebo topic messages to the gazebo topic ~/visual. It's possible that dropped messages could cause this problem.

It's unfortunately too late to fix this. I'll do some stress testing on my machine to see how frequently it occurs.
